item.description:
Hey Everybody! Your newest co-org here with an invitation to come work out some of your pent-up hostility from the week with a Friday night bowling party! Come crash heavy objects into little flying ones and win POINTS instead of court appearances for a change! Circle lanes sounds like a fun place for all this- lights low, music up, yummy food and of course, refreshing beverage.

Got some more details:
Moved it to 10pm, thats when the "xtreme" part starts.

Price: $18.65 for three hours of bowling, includes shoes.
Drink specials: Didn't get us a group discount, but they have a full lounge including margaritas and are apparently known for especially good Long Island Ice Tea's.
Food: Pizza, angus steaks, basically all kinds of good stuff.

Details from their site below.
Hope to see you there!
-Neil
cell: 203-645-2008

Welcome To

Hours subject to change
Join A New Bowling League Today. It's Easy. Use our new online sign up form.

We also offer a great new food & beverage menu that's sure to amaze you. And we'll serve it to you laneside so you can keep the fun flowing. Bowling has changed. Come in and enjoy the new experience at AMF.

Upcoming Events
Xtreme Bowling

Looking for late night or weekend bowling fun? Take your game to an unexplored new level with Xtreme Bowling ? an adventure of lights, great music, wild bowling challenges, and (of course) your favorite food & beverages.
item.name: Ball, Pins, SMASH!! Its Xtreme Bowlin' Party Time!
